module: Module-level comment: The `RAM_sin_256` module implements a 256-entry, 16-bit ROM using the `altsyncram` component for Altera Cyclone IV E FPGA, designed for read-only access. It employs an 8-bit address, clock signal, and read enable input to fetch data. `sub_wire0` connects the altsyncram's output to the module’s output port `q`, ensuring correct data retrieval against the given address when read is enabled. Configuration parameters like memory size and clock management are set to fulfill the read-only specification and stored in "RAM_sin_256.mif".
